Structs/Argon2SwiftException.html#/s:11A.name: init(_:errorCode:)
Structs/Argon2SwiftException.html#/s:11A.abstract: Creates a throwable error object with the given code and message

Structs/Argon2SwiftException.html#/s:11A.name: localizedDescription
Structs/Argon2SwiftException.html#/s:11A.abstract: A getter for the error’s localized description

Structs/Argon2SwiftException.html.name: Argon2SwiftException
Structs/Argon2SwiftException.html.abstract: An exception to handle any Argon2 related hashing and/or verification errors

Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html#/s:11Arg.name: ARGON2_SALT_PTR_MISMATCH
Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html#/s:11Arg.abstract: Null password pointer with a given nonzero length

Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html#/s:11Arg.name: ARGON2_SECRET_PTR_MISMATCH
Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html#/s:11Arg.abstract: Null salt pointer with a given nonzero length

Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html#/s:11Arg.name: ARGON2_AD_PTR_MISMATCH
Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html#/s:11Arg.abstract: Null secret pointer with a given nonzero length

Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html#/s:11Arg.name: ARGON2_MEMORY_ALLOCATION_ERROR
Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html#/s:11Arg.abstract: Null associated data pointer with a given nonzero length

Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html.name: Argon2SwiftErrorCode
Enums/Argon2SwiftErrorCode.html.abstract: An enum to manage the argon2 error codes, almost exacly synchronous with the error codes given from the actual Argon2 C reference library with the addition of Unknown error in case

Enums/Argon2Type.html.name: Argon2Type
Enums/Argon2Type.html.abstract: An enum to select the Argon2 type used to hash, contains 3 modes: i, d, and id, each signifying their corresponding Argon2 type

Enums/Argon2Version.html.name: Argon2Version
Enums/Argon2Version.html.abstract: An enum to wrap around the Argon2 Version used in the hashing operation, which can be either V13 or V10

Classes/Salt.html#/s:11Argon2Swift4SaltC.name: bytes
Classes/Salt.html#/s:11Argon2Swift4SaltC.abstract: The byte-array that the salt class wraps around

Classes/Salt.html#/s:11Argon2Swift4SaltC.name: init(bytes:)
Classes/Salt.html#/s:11Argon2Swift4SaltC.abstract: Initializes a new Salt object with the provided byte array

Classes/Salt.html#/s:11Argon2Swift4SaltC.name: newSalt(length:)
Classes/Salt.html#/s:11Argon2Swift4SaltC.abstract: Initialized a new Salt object with a cryptographically secure random byte array

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.name: hashBytes
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.abstract: The byte array of solely the hashed result

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.name: encodedBytes
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.abstract: The byte array of the encoded result, containing the hash, version, salt, and Argon2 params

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.name: init(hashBytes:encodedBytes:)
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.abstract: Initializes a new Argon2SwiftResult object with a given encoded byte array and hash byte array

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.name: hashData()
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.abstract: A method to return the hash as a Data object

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.name: encodedData()
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.abstract: A method to return the encoded hash as a Data object

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.name: base64String()
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.abstract: A method to return the hash as a base64-encoded String

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.name: hexString()
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.abstract: A method to return the hash as a hex-encoded String

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.name: encodedString()
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html#/s:11Argo.abstract: A method to return the encoded computation in its string form

Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.name: hashPasswordString(password:salt:iterations:memory:parallelism:length:type:version:)
Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.abstract: Hashes a given String password with Argon2 utilizing the given salt as well as optionally the specific parameters of the hashing operation itself

Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.name: hashPasswordBytes(password:salt:iterations:memory:parallelism:length:type:version:)
Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.abstract: Hashes a given Data password with Argon2 utilizing the given salt as well as optionally the specific parameters of the hashing operation itself

Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.name: verifyHashString(password:hash:type:)
Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.abstract: Verifies a String password with the given encoded String, returning true on successful verifications and false on incorrect ones.

Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.name: verifyHashBytes(password:hash:type:)
Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.abstract: Verifies a Data password with the given encoded Data, returning true on successful verifications and false on incorrect ones.

Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.name: getArgon2Type(type:)
Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.abstract: A method to map the Argon2Type Swift enum to the Argon2_type C struct in the reference library

Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.name: setPtr(length:)
Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.abstract: A method to set an [Int8] mutable pointer that the C methods will modify with results

Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.name: freePtr(pointer:length:)
Classes/Argon2Swift.html#/s:11Argon2Swif.abstract: A method to deinitialize and deallocate an Int8 mutable pointer that has been already allocated

Classes/Argon2Swift.html.name: Argon2Swift
Classes/Argon2Swift.html.abstract: Main class to handle all Argon2 hashing and verification

Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html.name: Argon2SwiftResult
Classes/Argon2SwiftResult.html.abstract: A wrapper class containing the result of a hash operation performed with Argon2, allowing for ease conversion of the byte array as well as raw access

Classes/Salt.html.name: Salt
Classes/Salt.html.abstract: A class to wrap around Salts in argon2. allowing cryptographically secure generation of salts as well as utilization of premade salts
